definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
camera (abbr. for 照相機|照相机[zhao4 xiang4 ji1])/at the opportune moment/as the circumstances allow
body of a vehicle or machine/fuselage of a plane

sentences.english: The terminal is used in conjunction with a photographic typesetter.
sentences.chinese: 這種終端與照相排版機一起使用。

sentences.english: Guo-rail crane is a kind of bridge cranes.
sentences.chinese: 過軌起重機是橋式起重機的一種。

sentences.english: Mr Wakshlag describes it as "a hit-saving machine".
sentences.chinese: 瓦克施萊格先生形容它爲一部“熱播回放機”。

sentences.english: The machine is controlled by micro-computer, and it adopts stepping motor to feed materials.
sentences.chinese: 本機採用微機電腦控制，步進電機拖料。

sentences.english: Can I check in here for the Air France flight to Paris?
sentences.chinese: 我乘法航班機飛往巴黎，能在這裏檢票嗎？

sentences.english: The retaining ring is an important component of turbogenerator.
sentences.chinese: 護環是汽輪發電機的重要部件。

sentences.english: This paper analyses several factors which influences the self - priming pump of the unloader of Ore Terminal .
sentences.chinese: 分析了影響礦石碼頭卸船機自吸泵的幾個因素。

sentences.english: The insect-killing machine has the advantage of better insect-killing effect.
sentences.chinese: 本殺蟲機具有殺蟲效果較佳的優點。

sentences.english: The Company is a professional manufacturer of all types of high-tech computer embroidering machines.
sentences.chinese: 是一家專業生產各類高科技電腦刺繡機的生產廠家。

sentences.english: ABSTRACT Traditional methods of turbomachinery design have made great success.
sentences.chinese: 葉輪機傳統的設計方法已取得了很大的成功。

sentences.english: In eats machine in the family, the antisubmarine aircraft is submarine's natural enemy.
sentences.chinese: 在喫機家族中，反潛機是潛艇的天敵。

sentences.english: Booksewing needle for the MARTINI, ASTER sewing machine.
sentences.chinese: 馬天尼阿斯達鎖線機專用針。

sentences.english: The appropriate files are downloaded to the local machine.
sentences.chinese: 把適當的文件下載到本地機。

sentences.english: Our factory also carries on researches of all types of non-standard thin-walled metal rolling forming machines.
sentences.chinese: 本廠並承接各種非標薄壁金屬型材滾壓成形機的研製。

sentences.english: In this paper, the design of a safe and multifunctional gastric lavage machine is presented.
sentences.chinese: 介紹一種安全的多功能的洗胃機。

sentences.english: Discussed the rebuilding and application of an automobile redirector rack automatic straightening machine.
sentences.chinese: 介紹汽車轉向器全自動校直機的改造及應用。

definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct
to exchange/to change (clothes etc)/to substitute/to switch/to convert (currency)
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
should/ought to/probably/must be/to deserve/to owe/to be sb's turn to do sth/that/the above-mentioned
